name: The Finer Things
description: The Guardians are no closer to finding a solution to Dax's former hosts being dispersed. Their new hosts have no choice but to resume their lives as they are. But Quark soon finds that, when it comes to business, two heads may not be better than one.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Joran Sisko, any version of Quark, Leeta, Gray or Trill crew will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Joran Sisko, Quark, Leeta, Gray, or Trill crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Kira
featured_crew.flavor: Lela was Dax's first host and one of the first women to serve as a council member. Kira did not hesitate to host such a remarkable figure.

action.name: What is a Person, But The Sum of Their Memories?

featured_crew.name: Leeta
featured_crew.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

featured_crew.name: Gray
featured_crew.flavor: Now a part of Adira, Gray supports them unseen.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Kira
rewards.flavor: Lela was Dax's first host and one of the first women to serve as a council member. Kira did not hesitate to host such a remarkable figure.

adventures.name: Fun and Games
adventures.description: Set up games that would appeal to younger patrons.

adventures.name: Adequate Advertising
adventures.description: Create ads to tell the galaxy of Quark's new venture.

adventures.name: Sweetening the Deal
adventures.description: Gather recipes for dessert dishes from across the galaxy.

adventures.name: A Sound Business Plan
adventures.description: Help Quark and Audrid manage the bar (and each other).

rewards.name: The Finer Things
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Gray
rewards.flavor: Now a part of Adira, Gray supports them unseen.

rewards.name: Leeta
rewards.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Focus on the profits with the <b>Ferengi Alliance<b>.

potential_rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
potential_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

potential_rewards.name: Credits
potential_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Find a way to function with the Ferengi Traditionalists.

rewards.name: Chronitons

screens.text: "Well, looks like everyone involved in the swap is gonna have to get comfortable having a visitor for awhile. The Guardians are completely lost. Not to mention how this whole thing is out and upsetting Trill society at large. And we're still no closer to finding Commander Sisko."

"Look, kid, I'm sure Sisko's fine. He's a god or something, right? I'm the one that's got real problems over here. This Audrid woman is trying to ruin my business. Would you believe she actually wants me to offer a family discount? A discount!"
"You would think I swapped the bloodwine out for synthale with the way you're reacting, Quark. And ruin? I'm trying to help you, dear."
"Captain, we have a lot to do here to get Quark's up to snuff. We could certainly use your help. I'm sending you a honey-do list of items. Be a dear and take care of these for us?"
